name: JSFiddle
description: Test your JavaScript, CSS, HTML or CoffeeScript online with JSFiddle code editor.

name: StackBlitz
description: StackBlitz is an online IDE where you can create Angular, React, and Vue projects quickly and easily in your browser.

name: CodeSandbox
description: CodeSandbox is an online code editor and prototyping tool that makes creating and sharing web apps faster.

name: Glitch
description: Glitch is the friendly place where everyone builds the web.

name: PLAYCODE
description: The fastest and simplest javascript playground with real-time result view and console. Learn, test and prototype easier.

name: JSitor
description: Test your JavaScript, CSS, HTML online with JSitor code editor.

name: Liveweave
description: Liveweave is a HTML, CSS & JavaScript playground for web designers and developers.
